original_text: King Jeroboam heard the message that God's servant shouted against the altar at Bethel. As he stood there at the altar, the king pointed his hand at God's servant. He said, ‘Take hold of that man!’ But when he pointed with his hand, it suddenly became useless and he could not pull it back.
korean_text: 여로보암 왕이 하나님의 사람이 벧엘에 있는 제단을 향하여 외쳐 말함을 들을 때에 제단에서 손을 펴며 그를 잡으라 하더라 그를 향하여 편 손이 말라 다시 거두지 못하며

sentences.original_text: that God's servant shouted against the altar
As he stood there at the altar
the king pointed his hand at God's servant
sentences.korean_translation: 왕은 하나님의 종을 향해 손을 뻗었습니다

sentences.original_text: But when he pointed with his hand
and he could not pull it back
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 그것을 거둬들일 수 없었습니다
